mean_cn: n. 对角线；  adj. 对角线的，斜的，斜纹的
mean_en: joining two opposite corners of a shape (such as a square or rectangle) especially by crossing the center point of the shape
word_etyma: dia穿过 + gon角 + al后缀 → diagonal 对角线，对角线的
sentence: The diagonal pattern is more interesting but also more difficult to build.
sentence_trans: 对角线图案更有趣，但是更难修建。
